t: Amazon.com: SPROUD Dairy Free Milk ORIGINAL Flavor, Vegan Milk with Plant-Based Pea Protein, Shelf Stable Non-GMO, 1 Liter (Pack of 6)
s: The "Sproud" milk has a taste to it, most earthy, not like grass but it is something that needs to be said. If you don't mind that, the thickness is works for what it is use for. I tried the original in my latte's, but noticed a barista version. I am going to try it next and maybe the chocolate too. ... I love this brand ...

t: TV Presenter Maya Jama Becomes Investor & Co-Owner of Plant Milk Brand Sproud - vegconomist - the vegan business magazine
s: October 29, 2024 - Award-winning British television presenter and entrepreneur Maya Jama has become an investor and co-owner of Swedish pea milk brand Sproud.

t: Amazon.com: SPROUD Dairy Free Milk BARISTA Flavor, Vegan Milk with Plant-Based Pea Protein, Shelf Stable Non-GMO, 1 Liter
s: Usually the pea milk we get comes directly from Sproud, but this package came (much delayed) from FlipNFlop Deals. The cartons smell horrible, like a mix of plastic and something rotten, and the expiry date is in less than a month. I wish I could take a photo of the smell. It’s appalling. I’m really disappointed that I apparently can’t return these for a refund. They’re obviously unusable and undrinkable. ... I love this brand ...

Sproud unsweetened contains no sugar but is still a sweetheart. Low on carbs and calories but high in protein. Drink it as it is or use it in smoothies, cooking, baking, with cereal or in coffee or tea.

t: Disruptive Plant-Based Milk Brand Sproud to be Stocked at Sprouts Farmers Market - Perishable News
s: August 12, 2020 - Swedish brand Sproud, which makes plant-based milk from pea protein, has announced that its drinks will soon be available at Sprouts Farmers Market. It recently entered the North American market by launching on Amazon. ...
